definition: not to be altered or undone, an examination administered at the end of an academic term
details:
adjective
- not to be altered or undone
= example: not to be altered or undone
= synonyms: last
- occurring at or forming an end or termination
= synonyms: last
- conclusive in a process or progression
= example: conclusive in a process or progression
= synonyms: last
noun
- an examination administered at the end of an academic term
= synonyms: final examination, final exam
- the final match between the winners of all previous matches in an elimination tournament
